translations: 话题；开始；以取得优势的开局棋法；开场白

sentences.sentence: His favourite opening gambit is: "You are so beautiful, will you be my next wife?"
sentences.translation: 他最喜欢的开场白是：“你真漂亮。愿意做我的下一任妻子吗？”

sentences.sentence: Campaign strategists are calling the plan a clever political gambit.
sentences.translation: 竞选战略家们把这项计划称作一个狡猾的政治策略。

sentences.sentence: He sees the proposal as more of a diplomatic gambit than a serious defence proposal.
sentences.translation: 他认为与其说这是一项严肃的防御计划，不如说是一种抢占先机的外交策略。
